recipe.title: Grown-Up Gorp
ingredients: 1 ounces. good-quality semisweet chocolate, cut into small pieces
instructions: Combine the nuts, cherries, and chocolate in a bowl and pack in plastic or cello bags. Tie up with a twisty or tape closed.
Combine the nuts, cherries, and chocolate in a bowl and pack in plastic or cello bags. Tie up with a twisty or tape closed.
